# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d867-102">읽음 확인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d867-103">메시지에 대 한 읽음 확인 또는 배달 확인을 요청 하려면 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="8d867-104">세 점 선택</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8d867-105">메시지 작성 창의 맨 위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8d867-106">**메시지 표시 옵션**을 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="8d867-107">읽음 **확인 요청** 또는 **배달 확인을 요청**하거나 둘 다 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d867-108">Outlook에서 읽음 확인 요청에 응답 하는 방법을 선택 하려면</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8d867-109">**설정** > **모든 Outlook 설정** > **메시지 처리**를 표시 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="8d867-110">자세한 내용은 [웹용 Outlook에서 읽음](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157)확인를 참조 하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d867-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
